activities: Appthority, Inc. provides the industry's first all-in-one Mobile App Risk Management service that employs static, dynamic and behavioral analysis to discover hidden actions of apps and empower organizations to apply custom policies to prevent unwanted app behaviors. Appthority processes certain limited personal information regarding its business customers' employees, consultants, contractors or other personnel whose mobile devices connect to the customers’ networks and are managed by Appthority.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Personal information of business customer employees and personal information from Appthority's business development efforts.
